cleaned_text: | | HYDRATING ALOE BODY TREATMENT This cocooning body wrap includes gentle exfoliation, nourishing Aloe Vera and a relaxing foot massage. Softens and soothes even the most sensitive skin while providing ultimate hydration to the body. 60 min/ $125; 90 min/ $150 HERBAL DETOX WRAP This clarifying face and body treatment rejuvenates and purifies. An invigorating dry exfoliation, detoxifying herbal wrap, and vitamin rich face massage brighten and tone the skin.
